params._ticketNumbers: : array of ticket numbers between 10,000 and 19,999

claimAllTickets(uint256).details: Callable by users only, not contract!

claimTickets(uint256,uint256[]).details: Callable by users only, not contract!

params._autoInjection: : reinjects funds into next lottery (vs. withdrawing all)

params._amount: : amount to inject in CAKE token

params._priceTicketInCake: : price of a ticket in CAKE
params._rewardsBreakdown: : breakdown of rewards per bracket (must sum to 10,000)

buyTickets(uint32[]).notice: Buy tickets for the current lottery

claimAllTickets(uint256).notice: Claim all winning tickets for a lottery

claimTickets(uint256,uint256[]).notice: Claim a set of winning tickets for a lottery

drawFinalNumberAndMakeLotteryClaimable(u.notice: Draw the final number, calculate reward in CAKE per group, and make lottery claimable
